name: Holy Dragon, Sanctuary Guard Imperial
effect:
[Stride]-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.

name: Arc Saver Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):[Counter-Blast 3 & Soul-Blast 3] At the beginning of your main phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to one card each from your deck, soul, drop zone, and damage zone, up to a total of three cards, call them to separate (RC), and shuffle your deck.

If you do, reveal two cards from the top of your deck. This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each grade 1 or less card revealed with this effect until end of turn. Put the cards revealed with this effect into your hand.

effect:

If you do, [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. This ability cannot be used for the rest of that turn.
[CONT](VC):If you have a card named "Regalia of Wisdom, Angelica" in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
[CONT](VC/RC):Lord
